contents.title: Full Stack Development for end-to-end application lifecycle management:
text: Deep understanding of software architecture principles, enabling scalable and maintainable solutions.
Independently designing and developing full-stack applications, transforming raw data into dynamic, user-friendly interfaces.
Owning the entire development lifecycle from front-end and back-end to database design and deployment.
Managing deployment processes to staging and production environments, ensuring smooth and reliable releases.
Leading continuous integration and deployment pipelines to ensure efficient, error-free production workflows.

contents.title: Comprehensive Testing Expertise for High-Quality Software Delivery:
text: Deep understanding of the importance of high-quality tests in software engineering and the principles behind writing effective, maintainable tests.
Proficient in writing front-end unit tests using Jest and React Testing Library, back-end unit tests using xUnit, and end-to-end tests using Playwright.
Led the full lifecycle of E2E test setup, from initial proof-of-concept (POC) to code setup, test writing, documentation, and coaching non-developers such as QA teams.
Ensure quality at every stage of the process, including conducting code reviews, optimizing test strategies, and deploying tests through CI/CD pipelines.
Implement best practices in testing to increase test coverage, reduce defects, and streamline the development workflow.

contents.title: Highly skilled and creative, I am passionate about delivering robust, scalable, and user-centered web applications:
text: ⬇️ My typical responsibilities include ⬇️
Architecting and developing complex, reusable front-end systems integrated with scalable backend services.
Establishing and enforcing best practices in code quality, testing, and performance optimization.
Driving continuous integration and deployment processes, ensuring smooth delivery pipelines and production readiness.
⬇️ I also contribute by ⬇️
Designing and implementing advanced UI/UX patterns with accessibility and responsiveness in mind.
Performing code reviews, mentoring team members, and fostering a collaborative development culture.
Evaluating and introducing new technologies to improve product quality and team efficiency.

contents.title: Expertise in .NET Core, RESTful API design, and SQL for full-stack web applications:
text: Design and develop both front-end and back-end components to deliver complete, end-to-end solutions.
Build scalable, secure RESTful APIs using .NET Core and integrate them with front-end technologies.
Architect and build end-to-end solutions, seamlessly integrating front-end and back-end components.
Ensure thorough testing (unit and integration) to guarantee system reliability and performance.
Leverage Entity Framework Core and advanced SQL for efficient data modeling, querying, and manipulation.
